page.title: 03OCCUPATION
page.content: What do the people of the glen do for a living? This is a question we are often asked.Taking the parents of the school children as our survey group, here are our results. Estate Factor 1 Gamekeeper 1 Shepherd 2 Cattleman 1 Student 2 Homehelp 1 Housewife 6 Unemployed 1 Not everyone who lives in the glen works there.The estate factor travels to Brechin everyday which is a distance of 15 miles. The two students travel a distance of 32 miles to Dundee University and the homehelp 10 miles to Kirriemuir. The only person who comes into the glen to work is the teacher.
